imdb.title: Demi-chan wa kataritai
imdb.plot: In a modern alternate reality, a teacher studies the unusual lives of his school's demi-humans.

episodes.title: Takahashi Tetsuo Wants an Interview
episodes.plot: Takahashi Tetsuo, a biology teacher at Shizaki High School, has been fascinated with "demi-humans" since he was in college. He wishes he could have a chance to talk with one, but since the demi-human population is fairly low, he's never even met one.

episodes.title: Dullahan-chan Wants to Be Coddled
episodes.plot: Machi Kyouko is a dullahan, a demi-human with roots in Irish legend, and one of only three of her kind in the whole world. One day, she stays after school to talk to Tetsuo about her unique problems, and also asks a favor of him...

episodes.title: Succubus-san Is a Real Adult
episodes.plot: Satou Sakie, a succubus, is extremely careful in every facet of her life, from where she lives to the trains she rides to the clothes she wears, so as to avoid causing intense reactions in men.

episodes.title: Tetsuo Takahashi Wants to Protect
episodes.plot: Kusakabe Yuki overhears some girls saying mean things about her. Gossip is not an uncommon problem among high school girls, but Yuki is particularly worried that it's happening because she's a demi.

episodes.title: Snow Woman-chan Is Cold
episodes.plot: Yuki has become a bit more optimistic, thanks to Hikari and Machi. She's learned to trust Tetsuo a bit more since what happened last time, and has decided to tell him what troubles her about her own nature as a snow woman.

episodes.title: The Takanashi Sisters Are Undeniable
episodes.plot: Keeping his promise to Himari, Tetsuo visits the Takanashi household to talk to the sisters' parents. Though the twin sisters' names differ by only one letter, Hikari is a vampire, while Himari is an ordinary human.

episodes.title: Succubus-san Is Inquisitive
episodes.plot: Sakie spots a beautiful blond-haired boy sitting on the floor, crying and hugging his knees. He says his name is Kurtz and doesn't seem to be a student of Shibasaki High. Meanwhile, Hikari says she's just seen another suspicious individual in the school.

episodes.title: Demi-chans Want to Learn
episodes.plot: The midterm exam score rankings are posted. While Himari and Kyouko earned high ranks, Hikari is scolded by Tetsuo for getting three failing grades, so she resolves herself to study with Yuki.

episodes.title: Demi-chans Want to Try
episodes.plot: Sakie the succubus is spending her evening at home alone, ranting her troubles to her teddy bear, when she receives a call from Ugaki who offers up some interesting advice.

episodes.title: The Dullahan Surpasses Space-Time
episodes.plot: Dullahans are demi-humans whose heads are separate from their bodies. Naturally, Tetsuo is intrigued by the unique traits of dullahans, but Kyouko is just as interested in learning more about her own body.

episodes.title: Demi-chans Want to Support
episodes.plot: Tetsuo has offered to work with the girls to figure out how Hikari and Yuki can spend summer in comfort. But the school's head teacher suggests that the demi girls' total reliance on Tetsuo might actually be hurting them in the long run.

episodes.title: Demi-chans Want to Swim
episodes.plot: Ignoring Tetsuo's concerns that a vampire would struggle with the sun's direct rays in a pool, Hikari and the other demi girls meet at the school pool on Saturday for a day of play!

episodes.title: The Demi-chans' Summer Break
episodes.plot: During summer break, Tetsuo asks Sakie to join him on patrol duty for the local summer festival, which both the demis and Himari and her friends go to. As each group decides to check out a nearby shrine, they get spooked by some strange occurrences.
